overview: Imagine someone or something takes your identity, along with your memories and emotions.  Thatâ€™s what happens to a nurse, Cathy Myers (Deborah Thomas). While making her rounds, Cathy is attacked by a patient.  Soon she finds herself driven by a hunger she cannot control.  Absorbing the very souls of those unfortunate enough to cross her path.  THE SLEAZE BOX presents Chris Woods' CHAMELEON!
title: Chameleon
